TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStackWalk

summary.span: 管理堆疊查核行程，其判斷呼叫堆疊中所有呼叫端是否具有存取受保護資源的必要權限。

span.span: Manages the stack walk that determines whether all callers in the call stack have the required permissions to access a protected resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分信任程式碼一律會顯示安全性風險。Partially trusted code always presents a security risk. 有時候可以代表沒有存取資源的權限的惡意程式碼執行動作操作。It can sometimes be manipulated to perform actions on behalf of malicious code that does not have permission to access a resource. 如此一來，惡意程式碼可以達到比應該允許較高的安全性存取權。In this way, malicious code can achieve higher security access than it should be allowed. 通用語言執行平台可協助保護免於這些攻擊的 managed 程式碼所執行的所有呼叫堆疊查核行程。The common language runtime helps protect managed code from these attacks by running a stack walk on all calls. 堆疊查核行程要求所有呼叫堆疊中的程式碼必須都具有存取受保護的資源的權限。The stack walk requires that all code in the call stack has permission to access a protected resource. 因為嘗試攻擊的程式碼一定會某處呼叫堆疊中，將無法超過自己的安全性權限。Because the code attempting the attack will always be somewhere in the call stack, it will be unable to exceed its own security permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Assert() cil managed

summary.span: 即使堆疊中較高的呼叫端未獲得資源存取權限，呼叫程式碼仍可以存取目前權限物件所識別之資源的判斷提示。

span.span: Asserts that the calling code can access the resource identified by the current permission object, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端的權限檢查就會停止。Calling stops the permission check on callers higher in the call stack. 因此，即使這些呼叫端沒有必要的權限，他們仍然可以存取資源。Therefore, even if these callers do not have the requisite permissions, they can still access resources. 判斷提示是有效的程式碼呼叫時，才通過安全性檢查，它會判斷提示之權限。An assertion is effective only if the code that calls passes the security check for the permission that it is asserting. 呼叫之前呼叫程式碼會傳回其呼叫端，或直到的後續呼叫是有效呈現先前的判斷提示的效果不佳。A call to is effective until the calling code returns to its caller or until a subsequent call to renders the previous assertion ineffective. 此外，或移除暫止。Also, or removes a pending . 會忽略該權限的要求將會失敗，因為未授與的權限。 is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission will not succeed. 不過，如果在呼叫堆疊中較低的程式碼呼叫該權限，堆疊查核行程到達嘗試呼叫的程式碼時，會擲回。However, if code lower on the call stack calls for that permission, a is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call . 這是因為程式碼呼叫未被授與權限，即使應用程式嘗試它。This happens because the code that called has not been granted the permission, even though it tried to it. > [!CAUTION] > 因為呼叫移除所有程式碼呼叫鏈結中的需求必須被授與權限可以存取指定的資源，如果使用不正確或不當，它可以開啟個安全性弱點。Because calling removes the requirement that all code in the call chain must be granted permission to access the specified resource, it can open up security vulnerabilities if used incorrectly or inappropriately. 因此，應該使用小心謹慎。Therefore, it should be used with great caution.

span.span: The calling code does not have .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Demand() cil managed

summary.span: 判斷執行階段期間呼叫堆疊中的所有呼叫端，是否已獲得目前權限物件所指定的權限。

span.span: Determines at run time whether all callers in the call stack have been granted the permission specified by the current permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法通常可由安全程式庫來確定呼叫端擁有存取資源的權限。This method is typically used by secure libraries to ensure that callers have permission to access a resource. 例如，檔案中的類別安全類別庫的呼叫必要的之前執行檔案作業的呼叫端要求。For example, a file class in a secure class library calls for the necessary before performing a file operation requested by the caller. 不會檢查呼叫這個方法的程式碼的權限;檢查該程式碼的立即呼叫端從開始，然後進行堆疊。The permissions of the code that calls this method are not examined; the check begins from the immediate caller of that code and proceeds up the stack. 只有當沒有成功，就會引發。 succeeds only if no is raised.

exception.span: 此呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端，不需要獲得目前權限物件所指定的權限。

span.span: A caller higher in the call stack does not have the permission specified by the current permission object.

exception.span: 此呼叫堆疊中的呼叫端已呼叫目前權限物件上的 。

span.span: A caller in the call stack has called on the current permission object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Deny() cil managed

summary.span: 導致透過呼叫程式碼傳遞之目前物件的每一個 都失敗。

span.span: Causes every for the current object that passes through the calling code to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會防止呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端程式碼呼叫此方法，透過存取受保護的資源，即使這些呼叫端必須被授與存取權限。This method prevents callers higher in the call stack from accessing the protected resource through the code that calls this method, even if those callers have been granted permission to access it. 呼叫堆疊通常會表示向下成長，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫的方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 可以限制程式設計人員的責任或協助防止意外安全性漏洞，因為它可協助避免呼叫此方法從用來存取拒絕的權限所保護的資源。 can limit the liability of the programmer or help prevent accidental security vulnerabilities because it helps prevent the method that calls from being used to access the resource protected by the denied permission. 如果方法呼叫權限，而且如果到達時，該安全性檢查的呼叫堆疊中較低的呼叫端所叫用該權限時，將會失敗。If a method calls on a permission, and if a for that permission is invoked by a caller lower in the call stack, that security check will fail when it reaches the . 會忽略該權限的要求將會失敗，因為未授與的權限。 is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission will not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PermitOnly() cil managed

summary.span: 即使呼叫堆疊中較高層的程式碼已授與存取其他資源的使用權限，還是會導致經過呼叫程式碼、除了目前物件之外之所有物件的每一個 發生錯誤。

span.span: Causes every for all objects except the current one that passes through the calling code to fail, even if code higher in the call stack has been granted permission to access other resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類似於，在於兩者會導致堆疊查核行程符合則成功時失敗。 is similar to , in that both cause stack walks to fail when they would otherwise succeed. 其差異在於，指定權限，會導致堆疊查核行程失敗，但指定不會導致堆疊查核行程失敗的唯一權限。The difference is that specifies permissions that will cause the stack walk to fail, but specifies the only permissions that do not cause the stack walk to fail. 呼叫此方法，以確保您的程式碼，可用來存取指定的資源。Call this method to ensure that your code can be used to access only the specified resources. 會忽略該權限的要求將會失敗，因為未授與的權限。 is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission will not succeed. 不過，如果程式碼呼叫較低堆疊稍後呼叫該權限，堆疊查核行程到達嘗試呼叫的程式碼時，會擲回。However, if code lower on the call stack later calls for that permission, a is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call . 這是因為程式碼呼叫未被授與權限，即使它呼叫該權限。This is because the code that called has not been granted the permission, even though it called for that permission. 呼叫堆疊通常會表示向下成長，使方法呼叫堆疊中較高層呼叫的方法較低的呼叫堆疊中。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.
